languages.text: "Сначала я думал, что Теодора планировала навещать меня, чтобы позлорадствовать, но она ни разу не появилась на станции. Теперь я думаю иначе: для фон Валанциуса даже наказание должно соответствовать статусу — с отдельной золоченой тюрьмой и уникальными аугментациями, чтобы не марать облик династии жалким сервитором".

"At first I thought Theodora was going to pay me visits so she could gloat, but she never once appeared on the station. I have a different explanation now: for a von Valancius, even punishment must befit his status — with a gilded prison and one-of-a-kind augmetics so as not to have a pathetic servitor mar the dynasty's image."
languages.original_text: "Сначала я думал, что Теодора планировала навещать меня, чтобы позлорадствовать, но она ни разу не появилась на станции. Теперь я думаю иначе: для фон Валанциуса даже наказание должно соответствовать статусу — с отдельной золоченой тюрьмой и уникальными аугментациями, чтобы не марать облик династии жалким сервитором".

I have a different explanation now: for a von Valancius, even punishment must befit his status — with a gilded prison and one-of-a-kind augmetics so as not to have a pathetic servitor mar the dynasty's image."

languages.text: «Al principio creí que Theodora me visitaría de vez en cuando para regodearse, pero nunca puso un solo pie en la estación. Ahora tengo otra explicación: para un von Valancius, incluso el castigo debe estar a la altura de su estatus, con una prisión de oro y auméticos únicos, para evitar que un servidor patético dañe la imagen de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "At first I thought Theodora was going to pay me visits so she could gloat, but she never once appeared on the station. I have a different explanation now: for a von Valancius, even punishment must befit his status — with a gilded prison and one-of-a-kind augmetics so as not to have a pathetic servitor mar the dynasty's image."

traits.locale_text: «Al principio creí que Theodora me visitaría de vez en cuando para regodearse, pero nunca puso un solo pie en la estación. Ahora tengo otra explicación: para un von Valancius, incluso el castigo debe estar a la altura de su estatus, con una prisión de oro y auméticos únicos, para evitar que un servidor patético dañe la imagen de la dinastía».

languages.text: “一开始，我本以为西奥多拉会常常来我面前，对我幸灾乐祸，可她却一次都没来过。如今，我有了新的理解——对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝成员而言，即便是刑罚，也必须与犯人的身份相称。我必须被囚禁在镀金的监狱里，安装着独一无二的植入物。只有这样，我才不会像个惨不忍睹的机仆，损害王朝的形象。”
languages.original_text: "At first I thought Theodora was going to pay me visits so she could gloat, but she never once appeared on the station. I have a different explanation now: for a von Valancius, even punishment must befit his status — with a gilded prison and one-of-a-kind augmetics so as not to have a pathetic servitor mar the dynasty's image."

traits.locale_text: “一开始，我本以为西奥多拉会常常来我面前，对我幸灾乐祸，可她却一次都没来过。如今，我有了新的理解——对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝成员而言，即便是刑罚，也必须与犯人的身份相称。我必须被囚禁在镀金的监狱里，安装着独一无二的植入物。只有这样，我才不会像个惨不忍睹的机仆，损害王朝的形象。”

languages.text: 「まず、私はシオドーラがあざ笑うために私に面会に来るだろうと考えていたが、彼女はステーションに一度も現れなかった。今では別の説明ができる―フォン・ヴァランシウスにとって、処罰でさえその地位にふさわしいものでなければならない。金色の檻で独特なオーグメティックで、そうすれば哀れなサーヴィターが王朝のイメージを損なわなくて済む」
languages.original_text: "At first I thought Theodora was going to pay me visits so she could gloat, but she never once appeared on the station. I have a different explanation now: for a von Valancius, even punishment must befit his status — with a gilded prison and one-of-a-kind augmetics so as not to have a pathetic servitor mar the dynasty's image."

traits.locale_text: 「まず、私はシオドーラがあざ笑うために私に面会に来るだろうと考えていたが、彼女はステーションに一度も現れなかった。今では別の説明ができる―フォン・ヴァランシウスにとって、処罰でさえその地位にふさわしいものでなければならない。金色の檻で独特なオーグメティックで、そうすれば哀れなサーヴィターが王朝のイメージを損なわなくて済む」

languages.text: "Anfangs dachte ich, Theodora würde mich regelmäßig besuchen, um mich zu demütigen, aber sie kam nicht einmal auf die Station. Mittlerweile habe ich eine andere Erklärung: Im Falle eines von Valancius muss selbst eine Bestrafung seinem Status entsprechen ... mit einem goldenen Käfig und einzigartigen Augmentierungen, damit kein armseliger Servitor das Bild der Dynastie trübt."
languages.original_text: "At first I thought Theodora was going to pay me visits so she could gloat, but she never once appeared on the station. I have a different explanation now: for a von Valancius, even punishment must befit his status — with a gilded prison and one-of-a-kind augmetics so as not to have a pathetic servitor mar the dynasty's image."

traits.locale_text: "Anfangs dachte ich, Theodora würde mich regelmäßig besuchen, um mich zu demütigen, aber sie kam nicht einmal auf die Station. Mittlerweile habe ich eine andere Erklärung: Im Falle eines von Valancius muss selbst eine Bestrafung seinem Status entsprechen ... mit einem goldenen Käfig und einzigartigen Augmentierungen, damit kein armseliger Servitor das Bild der Dynastie trübt."

languages.text: « Au début, je croyais qu'elle comptait me rendre visite pour le plaisir de m'humilier, mais en fin de compte, elle n'a jamais mis les pieds sur la station. Aujourd'hui, je pense avoir trouvé une autre explication : pour un von Valancius, même une condamnation doit être à la hauteur de son rang. Avec cette prison dorée et ces augmétiques uniques en leur genre, elle évitait d'avoir à son service une créature pitoyable susceptible d'entacher l'image de la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "At first I thought Theodora was going to pay me visits so she could gloat, but she never once appeared on the station. I have a different explanation now: for a von Valancius, even punishment must befit his status — with a gilded prison and one-of-a-kind augmetics so as not to have a pathetic servitor mar the dynasty's image."

traits.locale_text: « Au début, je croyais qu'elle comptait me rendre visite pour le plaisir de m'humilier, mais en fin de compte, elle n'a jamais mis les pieds sur la station. Aujourd'hui, je pense avoir trouvé une autre explication : pour un von Valancius, même une condamnation doit être à la hauteur de son rang. Avec cette prison dorée et ces augmétiques uniques en leur genre, elle évitait d'avoir à son service une créature pitoyable susceptible d'entacher l'image de la dynastie. »

languages.text: "Başta Theodora'nın beni ziyaret edip böbürleneceğini düşünüyordum ama bir kez bile istasyona gelmedi. Durumum için farklı bir açıklama ürettim: Bir von Valancius'a verilecek ceza bile statüsüne yaraşmalı. Zavallı bir hizmetörün, hanedanlığın imajını zedelemesini istememiş olmalı. Bu yüzden yaldızlı bir hapishane inşa ettirdi, türünün tek örneği ogmetikler taktırdı."
languages.original_text: "At first I thought Theodora was going to pay me visits so she could gloat, but she never once appeared on the station. I have a different explanation now: for a von Valancius, even punishment must befit his status — with a gilded prison and one-of-a-kind augmetics so as not to have a pathetic servitor mar the dynasty's image."
